casebody.data:
Michael Dennis LONG
v.
STATE of North Carolina, DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY, et al. No. 419P12-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 2, 2018 Jodi Harrison, Assistant Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Michael Dennis Long, for Long, Michael Dennis.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 2nd of April 2018 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Catawba County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of April 2018."
